"I...wh...y...you're asking me that?!" Roche fumed, Raina's subtle enjoyment. "Just...I dunno, do what you always do! Trip on him, brainwash him, turn him into the stuff, for all I care, just...just something discrete, alright?"

"Now, something discrete, I can't guarantee." Raina smirked, further irritating Roche. "Something not reportable, though, would be a better choice of words."

"Just do it soon, and do it far away from me. Capiche!?" Roche seethed, clearly itching to kick the coyote out of her room.

Smirking, Raina rolled her eyes and held out an open paw. "Deal."

But Roche didn't even bother giving her a shake and went straight for the door, opening it wide and pointing down the hall. "We're set then. Bye."

Raina seemed legitimately surprised by Roche's bluntness, but let out a snicker as she saw her way out. Roche slammed the door shut the moment she was gone enough that it wouldn't hit her, still standing with her back against the door as she let out a long, exasperated sigh.

That bitch! Marc fumed, fingers tensing around the vent's rungs as any pity he once felt from Roche's photograph faded away. It almost made him forget the warzone he'd treaded through underneath Sasha just an hour ago, whom he was suddenly eager to see in action and inflict whatever flatulence-related justice she had in her belly on the sickly duck.

But then the anger faded away into a chill of paranoia, imagining having to go up against Raina. Even in the rule-sanctioned world behind the scene for the ASL, Raina was a time bomb of chaos waiting for any chance to pour hair dye into the shampoo of her coworkers, and that's when she wasn't using her powers torment the other wrestlers with whatever kind of sugar-coated madness you'd think would only exist in some nutjob's opium high. The worst of her prank-driven hijinks were her servants, whom she'd stopped calling anything other than "toys" long ago.

...and now, somebody was paying her to do all that.

The chills going down Marc's spine kept him frozen there for a whole minute before snapping out of it, and crawled his way back the entrance he'd made of the vent...
12422212.title: Another fighter!

124222123.content:
Marc just started crawling back when a voice whispered in his ear, "What're we watching?"

Marc nearly jumped out of his skin as he turned around and saw Raina right behind him. She smirked mischievously as she stared him up and down. A flood of questions entered Marc's mind. "What. How? What? Why? How? How?! HOW?!"

How was indeed the predominant question as not only had Raina somehow appeared directly behind him when not thirty seconds ago he had seen her walking out of Roche's room, but despite how the vent squeezed him on all sides and Raina's sizeable girth, she fit inside no problem, as if the metal somehow adjusted itself to her comfort. There were even a few inches of space above her head. It was true, she really was magic! It was one thing to hear it in rumors and another to see clear magic workings right in front of him. Marc's open-mouthed bewilderment just seemed to amuse Raina more.

"So," she said, "you must be Sasha's trusty sidekick."

"I'm not her sidekick!" Marc snapped without thinking.

"Really? Would you prefer "slave" instead?"

"... Sidekick's fine."

Raina giggled. "Word of advice, if you're going to be working for the Poison Fart Frog, you might want to shower before crawling around in the ductwork to spy on people."

"I wasn't spying," Marc said hurriedly.

"Then what are you doing here?"

Marc tried to come up with a plausible excuse for why he'd be crawling in the ducts above the room of his boss's rival wrestler, but he came up dry.

"Trying to get an autograph?" Raina suggested. "Or maybe trying to sneak a peek? How scandalous!" she said in mock terror. Marc blushed. "Or... maybe you were trying to figure out how the ugly duckling made it so far in the ASL? So... have you figured it out, trusty ward?"

Marc gulped. "I-I didn't see anything! Or hear anything!"

"Oh? Then allow me to fill you in! Using my vast but vaguely-defined powers, I'm helping Roche cheat in her fights so she can waddle her way into the spotlight for her fifteen minutes of fame. Her latest assignment is for me to get this," she said producing a bag of unidentifiable green, leafy things from nowhere, "on her pathetic, new slave--aka you--" she said, pointing a claw at you, "and then get you back into contact with the Poison Fart Frog before their climactic battle tomorrow night! It's some kind of rare, ground up lily pad I think. Sasha's apparently highly allergic to it. A few minutes after being in her presence and she'll spend the rest of the week as a big, gassy beach ball. That'll give Roche plenty of time to knock her all over the ring tomorrow night. There, glad to help you get up to speed! Oh shoot," she said, snapping her fingers as if coming to a sudden realization. "Now I guess you know too much. Darn. Guess now we need to move on to the fun part!"

"Wait!" Marc yelped, feebly scooting back from Raina's extended hand. "Waitwaitwaitwait! Why?! Why are you even doing this?!"

"The same reason I do anything really," she said with a playful shrug. "Because it's fun! Getting all these big bad career fighters to lose to someone so pathetic is hilarious! It's gonna be even funnier when the ugly duckling figures out how big of fall she's in for once I get bored of helping her. Now, enough evil monologuing, Mr. Sidekick! Time for the fun to begin!"

This time Raina ignored Marc's pleas as she grabbed him, clamping a paw on his face to silence him, then maneuvered you both out of the air vents. A minute later and you were both out of the ductwork and into the hallway. Only this hallway wasn't outside Roche's room. It was right outside Sasha's! "Damn magic!" Marc thought.

"And here's the abode of our flatulent hero, eagerly awaiting the return of her trusty ward! Now, the simple thing to do would be to mess with your memories and just cover you in the stuff, but where's the fun in that? I already have several delicious ideas on other ways to get you to get that lily dust on the Fart Frog. You might even survive one of them! Isn't that nice of me?" Seeing the fear in Marc's eyes, she leaned in conspiratorially and whispered a parody of an supervillain's laugh in his ear, "Mu-ha-ha."

How will Raina use her powers to carry out Roche's job?
124222123.title: He crawls backwards, only to find Raina behind ...

1242221231.content:
"You know, Sasha is really underappreciated here," Raina said. "Poor girl just wants to fight the good fight for justice, and no one ever thanks her. I think I should give her a gift! Maybe a tasty treat? I know she just loves big, juicy flies. Maybe she'd be happy if one magically appeared in her room? What do you think?" she asked Marc.

Marc's screams were muffled by her paw.

"You're right, maybe food wouldn't be ideal. Ooh! What do you think about a wrestling outfit for her? Something flashy and heroic that could strike fear into the hearts of evil-doers! And you'd play an integral part in her outfit! A handy pair of shorts to stop others from hearing the sound of her... little problem. With your help, she may never be called the Fart Frog again! What do you think?"

Marc wriggled in protest, trying to break free of Raina's grip but his efforts were in vain. Become Sasha's lunch or her shorts?! This was a nightmare!

"Well if you're not gonna help, I'll just make the call for you," Raina said. "I think you'd best help Sasha as..."
1242221231.title: Fly or Tights

choices: Sasha's interrupted by someone at the door
12422212311.content:
"A big, juicy fly!" Raina said. She snapped her fingers and the struggling form of Marc was replaced with a human-sized fly.

"No, no, NO! Change me back, change me back!" Marc said. At least, that's what he tried to said. All that he could hear coming out of his mouth were buzzing sounds.

Raina seemed to have no problem understanding him, however. "Afraid I can't do that, buzz-boy. I got paid in advance for this job and I need to finish it."

Marc's captor ripped open the bag of ground lily pads and sprinkled it on him like a seasoning. Marc tried to fly away but Raina's hold was too strong on him and he ended up coughing as he breathed in a lungful of the substance.

Raina giggled, "You're such a fun little loser! I'll tell you what, I don't do this a lot but since I find you an enjoyable kind of pathetic, I'll make a deal with you. I'll be watching what happens in there. If you put on a good show, I'll make sure you survive this. If you don't, well..." she wiggled her eyebrows suggestively.

Marc hesitated in his escape attempt. She could do that? She clearly had powers but could they really extend to protecting him from harm?

"Scout's honor," Raina said. "Now, without further ado... Will Sasha's new ward be able to escape his froggy fate?" she intoned like a narrator in an enjoyably cheesy tv show. "Will he end up tongue-tied around his new boss? Will he find a way to stop bugging her? Or will he give her something to digest on? The answers to all these questions will be revealed... right about now!"

Raina quickly opened the door and threw the frantic fly-form of Marc into Sasha's room, closing the door quickly behind him. Marc took to the air difficultly. He'd never flown before, obviously, but it was hard to see with his new multi-faceted eyes, and the funk that lingered in the air was disorienting. He just hoped he had time to adjust to his new abilities, and that Sasha wasn't closeby--

"Huh? What was that?" Sasha asked. Marc slapped his head in frustration. The big blue frog got up from her seat and walked towards the door. "Trusty *urp* ward? Is that--Hellooooo!" she said breaking out into a wide smile, as she saw Marc buzzing near the ceiling. She laughed and licked her lips. "I spy with my little *uuurrrrpp* the biggest, tastiest treat I've ever seen! Guess somebody forgot to pay the exterminator! How did something as big as you get into my room?"

"Sasha! Sasha! It's me, Marc! You're new... sidekick? I was changed by Raina, you gotta help me!" He new everything he was saying was just coming out as buzzing but he needed to try at least, even if it was impossi--

"Don't worry, friend, I'll help you."

If flies could gasp, Marc just did. "Can you... Can you understand me?"

"Poor thing, I know you're just looking for a place of your own, well don't worry! I got the perfect spot for you!" Marc's hopes were dashed as Sasha slapped her stomach, then grimaced in embarrassment as she passed gas. "Now hold still!"

Marc recognized the sight of Sasha getting ready to lash out with her tongue and quickly weaved to the side. Her tongue missed him by a few inches and slapped against the ceiling. Marc's dodge had turned into a series of involuntary rolls in midair. He managed to straighten himself just in time to see Sasha getting ready for another strike. Marc went into a nosedive, her tongue whizzing over his head.

"Sasha! Sasha! Please stop!"

Sasha paid him no mind, she just scowled as her snack alluded her. It must've been a smart insect. It had never taken her more than twice to snag a bug before. "Guess I'm going to have to get trickier," she thought.

Marc waited as Sasha puffed herself up. She struck her tongue out and Marc was able to dodge again, but his moment of relief was short-lived. His new eyes allowed him to see Sasha's tongue somehow right itself in midair and change its course to come directly back at him. With a panicked buzz, Marc dodged again, but the tongue merely turned back around like a boomerang and came straight towards him.

Marc cursed. He was so stupid! Using her tongue to fight was Sasha's specialty in the ring! It had been the downfall of many of her opponents and now it looked like it'd be his too! Marc flew and the tongue followed in pursuit. He zigged and the tongue zagged, he rolled and looped in the air, and the tongue followed. Marc made his way across the room and Sasha waddled after him, retracting her tongue and beginning the whole frantic chase again. Marc could only imagine how ridiculous this must've looked to Raina, a high-speed pursuit between a fly and a tongue.

"Hope you're laughing your ass off, bitch!" Marc screamed.

Beads of sweat formed on Sasha's face as she focused on controlling her tongue. Part of her was curious how this fly was so smart, but the bigger, hungrier part of her just wanted this thing in her belly. An insidious idea popped into her head and Sasha smiled. She waited for the fly to get by a little closer then...

Marc flew fast as Sasha reeled her tongue back in like a fishing line. He was ready for another deadly game of dodging when Sasha puffed herself up. Only this time, instead of her tongue, a sound-barrier-breaking belch erupts from her mouth!

"UUUUUUUUUUURRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPP!"

Sonic waves and stale smelling air washed over Marc and disoriented him. He was flailing helplessly through the air in a blind panic, not knowing the difference between up and down. He tried to right himself but Sasha's powerful burp just went on and on. When the whirlwind finally stopped, Marc's eyes stung and there was a ringing in his... did fly's have ears?

By the time he noticed Sasha was getting ready to strike again, there was barely no time to react at all. Marc dodged and...
12422212311.title: Help me! Heeeeelp meeee!

choices: Marc wakes up alive and well as a human
Sasha's gonna need a new sidekick
124222123112.content:
Marc felt the wet splat of Sasha's tongue slam against his body.

"Oh sh--"

Sasha yanked her prize out of the air and pulled it into her gaping mouth. She'd already worked up a lot of drool, imagining the taste of giant treat. It was better than she imagined! Sasha plopped back down in her chair and enjoyed her treat.

The fly was drenched in her drool, as she worked it around her mouth and savored it's taste. Her tongue licked the bug up and down. As she sucked on the thing like a piece of candy, she belched every now and then inside of her mouth, nearly choking the little fly. The poor little thing frantically tried to escape. Sasha giggled as she felt its wings beating against the inside of her mouth. She had a wicked idea and opened her mouth.

Marc saw a chance for freedom and tried to take it. He made it two inches out of her mouth before Sasha lashed out her tongue and grabbed him again. She laughed and did it a few more times. Each time teasing her treat with hope, only to snatch it away. Eventually she began to feel bad for toying with it so much and decided to end it. Sucking on it for a few more seconds to get the last of its flavor, she finally worked it to the back of her throat and...

*Gulp*

Sasha felt the bug make its way down her throat slowly. She could feel it repeatedly try to fly up and out of her throat but every time it did that, she just gulped again and sent it on its way into its final destination. At long last the fly plopped into her stomach and Sasha let out a contented sigh.

"UUUURRRRRPPP!"

Sasha smacked her lips. The tickling sensation of the fly buzzing about in her belly pleased her. She hadn't had a bug that delicious in a long, long time. She didn't eat bugs in public. Her gas damaged her image enough, so she didn't need to be known as the "flatulent, bug-eating, wannabe superhero." In private though, it was nice to indulge.

She sat for a few minutes, feeling the struggles of the fly grow weaker and weaker. She knew that soon enough it's struggles would stop entirely. Poor thing.

Sasha grimaced as she felt more gas build-up inside her. She let off a few belches and farts to alleviate the tension, but somehow there seemed to be more than usual. A pain started in her gut, and her stomach groaned in protest.

"Ugh, don't tell me there was something in that fly... I... Eh?"

Sasha felt her tongue grow thicker in her mouth. She watched in shock as her fingers began to swell up. Then her arms, then her stomach.

"Oh no! Don't tell me that had lily--Oooooooh," Sasha clutched her stomach in pain and let out another fart. All of a sudden she was swelling up even bigger than usual. She protested as she grew too big for her chair and it broke beneath her. Her clothes stretched tight against her and strained to contain her flab. When she finally stopped growing, she was twice her usual size and practically a perfect sphere.

"ROCHE!" Sasha cried to the heavens. "FOUL, EVIL-DOER! EVIL-DOING FOWL! SHE DID THIS TO ME!" Sasha cursed. "I'm in no shape to beat her tomorrow, and I can't cancel the match! Insidious cur! Where is my sidekick?! Why didn't he warn me?!"

Meanwhile, inside Sasha's now even vaster stomach, Marc was not having a good time. He'd survived for several minutes, but was now floating in the stomach acid, quickly digesting. When he'd first been swallowed, he'd tried to fly above the ocean of stomach acid but his wings were weak from his constant flying and heavy from Sasha's drool that had soaked into them. Eventually he landed on a remnant of cake that he'd seen Sasha eating earlier. Guess his hopes were wrong. Guess he was joining the thing in her stomach. With his added weight, the cake eventually submerged into the burning liquid, and he went with it. He'd tried to swim but it was hard to do so, and eventually the stomach, and his unknowing captor, expanded as the allergic lily pads digested alongside him and took their effect on her. Now his prison was even bigger, but it did Marc no good as the tingling acids ate away at him.

"Raina," Marc said weakly. "You said if I gave you a good show you'd spare me. If that wasn't the best damn show of your life, you're a liar! Now change me back... change me... back..."

Marc blacked out and sank beneath the waves of Sasha's stomach acid, his body continuing to digest. His fate was in Raina's psychotic paws now.

Does Raina keep her word?
124222123112.title: Sasha hits her Marc

1242221231122.content:
In her room, Raina watched the sorry display through a crystal ball. She saw Marc sink beneath the stomach acids and let out an exaggerated yawn. "Meh. Two stars. What else is on?"

She flicked to a new image in her crystal ball, like changing channels on a TV.

The next day the match proceeded as scheduled. ASL employees needed to roll Sasha out onto the stage while Roche led the audience in laughing at her. When the bell rang to begin the fight, all Roche had to do was gently push Sasha to get her on her back, then stood triumphantly atop the giant frog's side as the referee counted to ten.

It looked like the match was in the bag for Roche... Until Sasha involuntarily let out an earth-shattering fart, one of the last remnants of Marc's troubled digestion. It was strong enough to role Sasha forward. Roche was unable to keep her balance and fell, where she was squashed underneath the amphibian vigilante and unable to move. To make matters worse for the evil avian, she was pinned directly beneath Sasha's butt and forced to suffer her gas from point-blank range. Now everyone in the audience was laughing at the duck's domination instead, but none harder than Raina herself who was wiping tears from her eyes as she laughed.

The match was over in less than a minute with Sasha victorious!

As for Marc, Sasha never learned what happened to her faithful sidekick. When he never returned, she assumed he'd been devoured by Roche or one of the forces of evil that aided her nefarious crimes. Sasha at least took comfort in the fact that she had bested Roche in the ring, avenging her sidekick by humiliating and crushing the evil-doer he fell prey to, never realizing that the true killer was her digestive system.
1242221231122.title: Sasha's gonna need a new sidekick

125.content:
Daisy
Species: Pig Anthro
Height: 25'2''
Appearance: Pink-skinned, blue eyed and red-haired which she draws back into a long ponytail. She has a smattering of freckles on her cheeks. Massively obese, Daisy has large breasts but a truly massive ass that protrudes out like a hill from her backside. Though surrounded in flab, her arms and legs are heavily muscled from working out. She wears stereotypical cowboy garb, her usual outfit being a white cowboy hat, a yellow vest, white cowboy boots, and daisy dukes that ride up her ass so much they look like a thong.
A Texan native, Daisy has been a tomboy ever since childhood. Unhygenic, uncouth, and willing to get down and dirty, most of this is owed to Daisy literally being raised in a barn. While she's always been passionate about sports, fighting has always been what she's loved most and she's dreamed of joining the ASL ever since she first found out about it. She's determined to rise the ranks and be the best fighter the league's ever seen. Incredibly competitive, she finds being in the Silver Division instead of the Gold to be unbearable. As a mistress, Daisy can be described as friendly but uncaring towards her servants. While she'll always talk to them jovially, and isn't known for eating her servants at random, her position in the league is her top priority, and she frequently recruits her servants to use as training dummies to practice her moves on. During these training sessions, she never holds back, and doesn't care at all about the pain or humiliation she inflicts on her servants. She also has a perfectionist streak, meaning that she's prone to trying out a move over and over again until she gets it right. Unfortunately, Daisy is also incredibly superstitious when it comes to good and bad luck. Like certain sports fans, she believes performing certain rituals guarantee her victory. For example, she once accidentally sat on a servant for two hours before a match. Since that match was later one of her most spectacular victories, she spent a week sitting on the hapless servant for two hours prior to every match. On the flip side, if her luck runs out, Daisy is paranoid and quick to blame her servants, thinking they've "jinxed her" or are actively trying to sabotage her career. Once that idea gets into her head, the best case scenario is that her servant will end up in the hospital. The worst is that they'll end up in her stomach. In a fight, Daisy will do anything to win.

Gloria aka Glamor Gator
Species: Alligator Anthro
Height: 27'1''
Appearance: Emerald-skinned with a golden underbelly, she has black glossy hair that she wears in ringlets, ruby-painted lips, black-colored eyes surrounded by purple mascara. Gloria is very much a big beautiful woman, and takes immense pride in her appearance, outside of the ring she wears elegant dresses, while inside her clothing becomes flashier while still remaining fashionable. She also uses specially designed make-up that doesn't run or smear even during fights in the league.
Gloria, or Glamor Gator as she prefers her stage name, is a total diva and narcissist. Gloria joined the league to gain fame and wealth, and works hard to cultivate an image of being a sophisticated, glamorous and powerful, yet feminine, figure. This careful management of her image has succeeded as she's scored consistently high in league popularity polls. Gloria believes she deserves the finest things in life, the best clothes, the best treatment, and the best food. This unfortunately causes her to gripe about "merely" being in the Silver Division instead of the Gold. Gloria is a cold and haughty person who demands constant respect and admiration but gives none in return, with the only people she ever treats nicely being her fans. She thinks little of her fellow fighters in the league, and nothing at all about the servants she's given, referring to them as merely "slaves" who exist to serve her every whim, and she has quite a lot of whims. She constantly works her slaves, demanding them to pamper her nearly 24/7. Humans have it particularly rough as they are also her favorite food. Those who fail her, either through incompetence or malice, are met with brutal punishment. Those who fail consistently are devoured. However, Gloria is not the type to just wolf down some poor sap on the spot, instead she'll go out of her way to prepare them as a wonderful feast. After all, she deserves the best. The only exception to this are those unfortunate souls who happen to catch her doing something "unladylike." Gloria has worked hard to maintain her imagine, and those who see her outside of the elegant portrayal she's constructed for herself are immediately eaten to silence them permanently. It's said her last slave was eaten merely for walking in and seeing her with a bad case of bed head. Rumor has it that Gloria actually comes from a family of sewer gators. This may explain her need to appear a perfect feminine beauty, but the rumor has never been confirmed because no one has dared to ask her. In the ring, Gloria fights with power and precision, her moves more stylish and acrobatic than the normal fighter.
125.title: Other Fighters

1251.content:
Once Marc reached the door of his new mistress, he spent a minute standing outside it in dread. He wiped the sweat from his forehead and tried to work up the courage to knock. Daisy was far from the worst mistress in the league, he had heard horror stories about fighters like Dominique or the "Glory Gator" that made his skin crawl. However, by the sounds of it, she was still a hundred times more dangerous than his old mistress. He let out a sigh, he missed her. Sure he'd only known her for a month and was essentially her slave... and she kept accidentally sitting on him... and had even nearly eaten him once when he had fallen into her breakfast... But putting all that aside, she'd been nice and had always apologized after injuring him.

Still, there was no use dwelling on the past or delaying the inevitable. Marc drew himself up and knocked on the door. The ground started to shake and Marc immediately rethought the benefits of delaying the inevitable. The door swung open and his new mistress stood before him.

Daisy was colossal, an obese, pig anthro who stood over twenty-five feet tall. Her ass was so massive that her daisy dukes rode up so far that it almost looked like she was wearing a thong. She was dressed as a cowgirl, wearing a white hat and cowboy boots. A white sports bra was all she wore under her yellow vest, her impressive cleavage was smattered with freckles like the ones on her cheeks. Remnants of her lunch covered her face and stained her clothes. She apparently ate like... Well, a pig. When she saw Marc, Daisy broke into a big smile.

"Well lookie here!" she said in a southern drawl. "I got me a gentleman caller!"

Marc blinked. "What? No! I--"

"No need to be shy, darlin'. Come on in and let Daisy show you some hospitality," Daisy said, bending down and scooping Marc up to crush him in a bear hug.

Marc struggled for breath as he was squeezed against pig flab and flailed ineffectually as the pig woman pulled him inside her room and locked the door behind them. The inside of her room looked like a cross between a barn and a gym. The wooden walls were painted red, straw covered the floor. One half of the room contained a massive mattress, a feeding trough in place of a dinner table with a massive hay bale standing in for a chair. The trough was filled to the brim with an assortment of foods, everything from burgers and pizzas to cakes and ice cream. The other half of the room was filled with weights and exercise equipment. Dirty clothes and food remnants littered the room.

"Hope you don't mind my living arrangements," she said. "It's rough bein' away from home and family. But now that I got a new lil boyfriend to keep me company, maybe I won't be so homesick!"

Marc finally managed to break free of her fat for a second to say, "Miss Daisy, there's been a mistake! I'm your new helper, not--"

Daisy let out an uproarious laugh, occasionally snorting as she did so, causing her layers of fat to jiggle. "Well, shoot. I know that, darlin'! You just looked so cute and scared, I couldn't help pullin' your leg!"

Daisy let him go, causing Marc to fall on the floor, landing on his ass. Daisy let out a grunt as she plopped herself back on her hay bale. She reached into her trough and pulled out a whole cake which she eagerly ate half of in one bite.

"You know," she said with her mouth full, "I got a good feeling about you! I'm not one to judge a book by its cover, but you got a mighty cover, if I do say so myself! Let's hope your the lucky charm I need." She paused in eating the rest of her cake and scrunched up her face as if she tasted something bad. "Hopefully, you're a better helper than the last one they sent me."

"Why?" Marc asked, getting to his feet. "What was wrong with him?"

"Little bastard suckered me in with his friendliness and eagerness to help. I was one match away from breaking into the Gold Division and all of a sudden I got the worst losing streak of my life! I hate losing!" she said, smushing the cake in a fist. She began licking the chocolate off her fingers.

"Um... what happened to him?" Marc asked, already fearing the answer.

Daisy fixed her blue eyes on him--they were surprisingly beautiful--and smiled. With her free hand, she patted her bloated stomach and a second later let out a herculean belch. Marc gulped.

"Let's forget about that lil' jerk," Daisy said. "I gotta full schedule lined up for you today, darlin'! Gotta break you in, somehow! There's a match coming up and I got new moves to practice. And there's loads of chores for you to get working on. This place is a sty!" she said then laughed and snorted at her own joke. "Now did I write first on your list?"
1251.title: Daisy - The Superstitious Tomboy

12512.content:
Marc looked around at the sty around him and begun to sweat. "I really hope that cleaning this disaster area up isn't the first thing on the list." He thought to himself. Daisy was trying to remember what the first thing she needed her new human servant for was and then let out a squeal as the first thing on the list finally came to her. "Ah know!" yelled the pig lady in her southern accent. "I need a training dummy for a new wrassling move ah've been working on. And it looks like you're the perfect match." Mark gave a gulp. "Oh no." He thought to himself. Daisy gave another snort and then nodded her head. "Better get yourself ready. Ah'd hate to break you on your first day." "She doesn't want to break me," muttered Marc to himself. "Sure she doesn't."

Marc walked to what looked like a large pad in the center of the room that looked like a waller of dried up mud and stood in place. He knew what happened would most likely be painful and the titanic sow was taking off her cowgirl hat and switched her vest to a zigzag-print vest and then put on a pair of mismatched socks. Marc was wondering exactly what the pig lady was doing, but he did remember that he was now working for a very superstitious giantess. Marc guessed that Daisy was in the middle of some kind of good luck ritual.

From the look of it, Marc was right because Daisy was standing on one food and jumping up and down. "Cetus, Buffalo, Unicorn!" she chanted. "Cetus, Buffalo, Unicorn!" Daisy then started to sway from side to side and closed her eyes before drawing pennies on them before she breathed in and breathed out and scratched her right ear. Marc was trying his best not to laugh, knowing full well that it would end painfully for him. Daisy then danced the worm as she spoke in an indecipherable language and then stood up again.

"Sorry," said Marc's enormous pig mistress. "But that's my training ritual for good luck. I gotta get this new technique just right. I need all the luck I can get in the Anthro Sumo League." Marc let out a sigh. "I know what you mean," Marc thought to himself. "I'm going to need all the luck in the world just to survive until my contract expires." Marc then coughed before Daisy waddled forward towards the ring. "Exactly what is the technique?"

Daisy cleared her throat before she told Marc exactly what kind of technique she was going to practice on him...
12512.title: Beta Test Piggy

choices: Stiched into the backside of Daisy's underwear
At the bottom of Daisy's feeding trough, covered in food (mouth play)
125122.content:
"The what?" Marc asked.

"Don't worry your cute lil' head, darlin'," Daisy drawled. "You ain't gotta do nothing but stand riiiiiiiiiiight here," as Daisy said this she picked up Marc and placed him in the center of the waller. She nudged him left and right a few times until she was perfectly satisfied he was directly in the center.

"Perfect! Now this is very important. Don't. Move," she said, poking him in the chest as she said it. The force of her mere finger poke was enough to cause him to stumble. Daisy glared. "What did ah just say?!"

She readjusted Marc's position and walked off the pad to a rope hanging nearby. "And now the finishing touches," Daisy said as she yanked on the rope.

Marc opened his mouth to ask what the rope was for but this proved to be a huge mistake, as a downpour of mud drenched him and made him gag.

"Awww," Daisy sighed. "Jus' like home. Now don't move, darlin'!"

Marc heard the thunder of footsteps rushing towards him. He wiped the mud out of his eyes just in time to see Daisy launched herself in the air. Marc watched in open-mouthed amazement as she did three flips in the air then started to come down, twisting so her massive ass was aimed straight at him. Daisy's backside crashed into him with the force of a meteor, squashing him like a pancake and crushing him into the fresh mud on the mat. Marc moaned beneath her. Above him he could hear Daisy speaking.

"Tarnation! Pardon my language, darlin'. Ah just get so frustrated when I mess up a routine."

Marc gasped as Daisy got off of him and pulled him off the mat with a squelching sound as he emerged from the mud.

"Alright," she said, barely paying Marc any heed. "You stand here and we'll go again."

"Wait!" Marc gasped. "We don't need to go again! That seemed perfect to me!"

"D'aw, that's sweet of you to say, darlin', but it's also a lie. The move's called the "Ham Sandwich." It only works when the "meat," she said grabbing Marc, "is directly between the two "buns,"" she said, showing Marc her crack. "You were crushed under a cheek."

"How's another anthro even supposed to fit up your crack?! Most are as big as you!"

"Most. Not all, darlin'. It pays to be prepared. Now, let's try again."

Marc pondered the possibility of running for it, but he was still weak from the move when he heard Daisy rushing at him again. She jumped, flipped twice in the air, and landed ass-first on Marc again. This time her aim was true and Marc shot directly up her crack. Marc blanched from the increased pressure and stench.

"DANG IT!" Daisy roared.

She got to her feet and picked Marc out of her crack like a wedgie.

"What was wrong now?!" Marc moaned.

"Ah'm supposed to do three flips, not two. Shoot. Well, no use stallin'. Let's go again."

He barely had strength to look up as he heard Daisy coming at him again. This time she did the move perfectly. A jump, three flips, a human up the crack, and her assistant in a state of pain and humiliation.

"Now we're talkin'!" Daisy cheered. "This'll drive the crowd wild! Ok," she said, getting up and prying Marc out of her backside, "let's do it again!"

"WHAT?! But you did it perfectly!"

"Yep," Daisy said, "and practice makes perfect! So we gotta make sure this success carries over to the ring!"

This time Marc did try to stumble away but Daisy quickly grabbed him and put him back into position.

"Wrong way, darlin'!" she said.

Marc tried to move again but his legs gave out and he fell to his knees. Next thing he new, he experienced the familiar sensation of total porcine ass encompassment. Once again, Daisy did the move perfectly, and once again she wanted to try it again... and again... and again... The sight of nothing but pink flesh and brown mud, the intense pressure, the horrid stench. It was all growing disturbingly familiar.

One hour later, Daisy was finally satisfied. "Alright, darlin'," she said, grabbing Marc's limp form, "I think that's enough. Let's move on to the next move! ... Darlin'?"

Daisy noticed that Marc had blacked out. It must've happened recently because he she had felt him squirming not ten seconds ago.

"Awww, poor lil' fella's plum tuckered out. He's so cute. Shame Ah can't afford to go soft! Can't have him sleepin' on the job and goin' unpunished. Now... what would be the best way to wake him?"

Marc awoke with a start a few minutes later. He was terrified to find himself...
125122.title: The Ham Sandwich

1251222.content:
Marc groaned in disgust as he realized he was covered in food. There was whipped cream and cherries in his hair, chocolate sauce and caramel on his chest and freezing cold lumps that turned out to be every flavor of ice cream in the world underneath him. He was confused for a few seconds, then he took in the walls on either side of him and realized something horrifying. He was inside Daisy's feeding trough!

As soon as he realized that, he was in for another scary surprise when his giant pig mistress appeared over him, looking down. She was wearing a bib with a knife and fork on it, and a human between them. She looked at Marc and the drool inside her mouth almost leaked out.

"Ah mus' say, darlin', ya sure do look mighty appetizin'!"

"Daisy! What's going on?"

"Well, darlin', ya passed out on me afore I was done trainin'. Ah can't have ya slackin' off! Trainin's important to me, and ah need ya to understand that! So... ah gotta punish ya."

"You're going to eat me?!" Marc squeaked. "Over one mistake?!"

Daisy let out a snorting laugh. "Of course not, darlin'! Don't be silly! Ah wouldn't eat ya over one lil' hiccup. This is just a warnin' for ya... And a bit of a treat for me." She licked her lips.

Marc groaned. He'd avoided being eaten in the past, but he'd been inside an anthro's mouth several times before. It was never pretty but it beat being digested.

"Just get it over with," Marc said.

"Don't mind if ah do!" Daisy said.

Daisy didn't just pluck him out of the trough like he expected. She grabbed the entire trough, lifted it over her head and tilted one side into her gaping mouth. One second Marc was on one side of the trough, the next he was sliding down like a freezing cold slide. He avoided going directly into Daisy's mouth but only because the scoops of ice cream piled up at the end into a small hillock. He landed on the mound and began sinking into it. It was like creamy quicksand.

Marc couldn't see well through the melted ice cream covering his face and eyes, but he could hear the greedy slurping, gulping sounds as Daisy messily devoured her trough of ice cream. Marc would've been impressed at her eating abilities if he wasn't dreading what would come next. The cold around his feet gave way to a warmth. Daisy's tongue had found her prize. She let out a squeal of pleasure as she licked Marc's feet, and despite how much Marc hated the situation, his feet were ticklish, and he couldn't stop laughing. He felt her lips chomp on his feet and before he knew it, she slurped him into her mouth like a noodle.

Marc's environment changed from the freezing cold of the ice cream mountains, to warm, wet and humid as he and the scoops of ice cream were worked around the inside of Daisy's mouth. Judging by the squeals of delight and moaning sounds Daisy made as she ran her tongue over his body and slammed him against her cheeks, Marc was a flavor sensation. A delightful combo as his taste mingled with each new flavor of ice cream she inhaled.

After a few seconds of savoring her dessert, Daisy would expertly maneuver the melted ice cream to the back of her throat and swallow, keeping her human sucker away. Clearly she'd had a lot of practice with not swallowing a living lifesaver. Marc wasn't sure if that was a good sign or not. He watched as gulp after gulp of frozen dairy product disappeared down her gullet, followed by frequent burps that he was forced to breathe in.

This wasn't the best time Marc had ever been in someone's mouth, but it also wasn't the worst. Usually when an anthro wanted a taste and he couldn't talk them out of it, he just let his body be loose and let them do whatever they wanted until they had enough and spit him out. This time was no different. His body hurt from the earlier training, his boss's breath stank to high heaven, and he'd get the occasional mouthful of pre-chewed ice cream and pig drool. In spite of all of that, he comforted himself with one crucial thought. "At least she isn't trying to eat me."

After fifteen minutes of this treatment, that thought wasn't much comfort. Daisy had swallowed the last of her ice cream a few minutes ago but she hadn't spit him out yet. She was sucking on him so hard that he was convinced she wanted every last drop of flavor wringed out of his body.

Another couple of minutes and Marc decided to go against his philosophy of playing dead in the mouth and just spoke.

"Daisy, please let me out."

She didn't reply. She just made satisfied slurping and munching sounds as she continued to taste him.

"Daisy!" Marc said louder. "Please let me out!"

She didn't respond again. Now Marc was getting worried. This had happened before when someone enjoyed his taste so much that she zoned out and just focused on savoring him. The time that happened, he'd nearly been swallowed. But surely that wouldn't happen this time. Right?
1251222.title: This Lil Piggy Had Human

12512222.content:
Daisy was in flavor heaven! She had never tasted anything so delicious in her whole life. Her eyes were glazed over as she delightedly sucked and slurped on her treat. The only thing ruining the moment was a small muffled sound, a faint buzzing in her ears like a fly. She ignored it as much as she could and instead focused on the magnificent taste on her tongue. Her stomach growled in anticipation. She was already full but she needed this tasty treat inside her. After several minutes she couldn't take it anymore. She tilted her head and swallowed. A screaming lump made it's way down her throat and plopped into her gut.

Daisy reclined on her hay bale seat contentedly and let out a victorious belch. She was in the first stages of a food coma. She rubbed her full belly contentedly--and felt her belly rub her back. It took a few seconds before the realization of what she'd done dawned on her.

"Oh... Tarnation."

"DAISY!" Marc's muffled shouts came from the depths of her stomach. He was pounding on her stomach walls to get her attention. "YOU ATE ME! LET ME OUT!"

Daisy blushed. It was always so embarrassing when this happened.

"Hey, Marc," she said nervously. "Um, sorry about that... Ah... Ah didn't mean to swallow ya. Ya just ended up so much more delectable than Ah anticipated. Ya shoulda warned me ya tasted so good!"

Marc nearly tore his hair out. "Well excuse me for not "warning" you about my flavor. I would've bathed in vinegar this morning but I was running late for work! Now will you get me out of here?!"

Does Daisy let him out?
12512222.title: Daisy Carelessly Swallows

125122222.content:
For a couple seconds Daisy didn't say anything. Marc was left with the sounds of her groaning insides and the lake of melted ice cream he'd been devoured with. Marc was starting to get worried. There was sweat on his forehead, and it wasn't just caused by the sweltering confines of the humid stomach.

"Daisy?"

"Oh, Marc, ah just feel awful about this whole thing. Ah never intended to eat you up, ah swear!"

Marc gulped. He didn't like the sound of her tone. "I know you didn't Daisy. It's alright. I forgive you. Just let me out."

"That's the thing," Daisy said sadly. "Ah can't let ya out."

"WHAT?!"

"Ya see, Marc, ah have a match tomorrow. Ah've already won a couple matches in a row, and ya know what happens when ah reach ten. Ah get promoted to the Gold Division! And... ya see... the last time ah threw up before a fight, it ended up bein' the worst match of my life. Ah lost in the first minute!"

"Daisy that's just a coincidence!" Marc said desperately.

"Ah just can't take that chance, Marc. Not when ah'm on a winnin' streak."

"So you're just gonna digest me out of some stupid superstition?!"

"Ah'm sorry, darlin'. Ah know these rituals sound crazy to some folk, but ah hope you can understand. You're really cute, and so tasty, but ah just can't afford to let ya out. Ah'm here to be the best fighter the ASL's ever known, and, sometimes... bein' the best means ya gotta be a lil' ruthless."

Marc raged and screamed inside her, but as far as Daisy was concerned, the conversation was over. She went about her day, training for her match the next day, lifting weights, doing exercises and practicing her moves on a training dummy. It would've been better to practice against a live target but that was no longer an option. If Marc thought things couldn't get any worse, he hadn't counted on living through a training regime with Daisy on the inside. Her stomach was like a zero-g chamber as his captor flipped through the air and taking Marc with her. He was weightless for a few moments before falling back into the lake of stomach acid and ice cream. He was squeezed and contracted like an accordion as he did crunches and squats. The absolute worst, however, were the belly flops. By the time Daisy's training was done, Marc had blacked, floating in the tingling liquid inside her stomach.

He woke up hours later as Daisy was getting ready for bed. He was in so much pain at this point that he'd like to say that digestion would be a mercy, but he'd be lying. He really didn't want to die, and as soon as he woke up he resumed his feeble pleas and struggles to convince Daisy to let him go. Unfortunately, his struggles weren't doing anything to change Daisy's mind. If anything, they convinced her to keep Marc inside her. In her opinion, one of the best parts of having a living meal was the massage they gave you inside your tummy. It tickled and was soothing all at once.

Daisy got into bed and pulled up the covers, then talked to the occupant of her engorged belly. "Well, darlin', ah'm sorry it has to be this way. We may not have known each other for very long, but you were a real sweetie. Ah would've liked it if ya could've stuck around a bit longer, but ah guess it just wasn' meant to be."

Her unwilling meal gave out a last desperate shout and pounded furiously against her stomach. The commotion caused gas to build up inside her and Daisy let out the biggest belch of her life.

"UUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUURRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPP P!"

Something came shooting out of her mouth and she caught it easily. It was Marc's employee ID.

"Oh, darlin'! Did ya wanna give me a souvenir to remember ya by? That's so sweet of you!" She smacked her lips. "And ya gave me one last taste too. Ah'm really gonna miss ya. No other assistant has ever been as givin' to me as you've been. Ah'll cherish this forever."

The sound coming from Daisy's gut may have been a groan or a sob. Daisy slipped Marc's employee ID into her substantial cleavage and turned off the light.

"Nighty, night Marc."

The next day Daisy made it to her match bright and early. She was bright, refreshed, and had a happy, warm feeling in her stomach. The match that followed was the easiest fight of her entire career. To her complete surprise, the opponent she'd been dreading was knocked out with only one punch. She was amazed with herself until she got back to her room and remembered Marc's employee ID still stuck between her monumental breasts. It didn't take much for Daisy to come up with a new superstition.

"Oh darlin', you really are my lucky charm."

Daisy slipped the ID with Marc's awkwardly grinning face on it back into her cleavage. From that day on, she'd never fight another match without her lucky charmed snuggled between her breasts. Her winning streak continued and before Daisy knew it, she had fought and beaten Avery herself, finally getting into the top ASL league. She remained in the Gold Division for the rest of her career, and she never lost a single fight. When asked about her amazing success, Daisy said she owed it all to her assistant giving her a lucky charm.
125122222.title: Marc's Lucky Charm

1252.content:
Marc hesitated outside the massive door to his new mistress's room. He really, really, really did not want to go in there. Whenever a person was assigned a mistress in the ASL, it was usually a 50/50 chance whether they'd be a good boss or a nightmare, but the Glamor Gator was the nightmare that even nightmares feared. The horror stories that floated around her made Marc's skin crawl. The only one who might beat her out as worst boss was Dominique since Marc heard she could do magic, but even then, "only" having the second-worst boss in the ASL was small comfort. Especially when rumor had it that the longest a human servant had lasted in Gloria's employ was only a month before he ended up on his boss's menu. Being assigned to the Glamor Gator was practically a death sentence!

After a few minutes of fantasizing about impossible, but incredibly tempting, escape plans, Marc knocked on the door before he could decide to abandon all reason and run.

"Enter," a cold, deep voice called from the other side of the door. Even muffled, Marc could make out Gloria's French accent.

Marc gulped and went inside.

He had heard that Gloria loved the finer things in life and her rooms at the ASL definitely reflected that. An aroma of flowers and cinnamon wafted around Marc upon entry. The main room was divided into several parts, a dining room, a kitchen, and a living room. Through an open door in the back, Marc was surprised to spy an indoor spa. The other two doors presumably led to Gloria's bathroom and bedroom.

Marc's new boss was sitting in the living room on a couch big enough for Marc's entire extended family. She wore a black glittering dress, and had a string of pearls around her neck. Marc was amazed to find himself thinking of her as beautiful. The thought was involuntary and confusing and he quickly tried to put it out of his mind.

Gloria's bare feet were propped on an ottoman. A flat-screen television big enough to flatten Marc into a pancake was opposite her. However, the television was off, and instead Gloria was reading a magazine. Marc couldn't see the cover but presumed his new boss's picture was on it. Why? Because an entire wall of the living room was covered wall-to-wall in magazines kept in pristine condition, all of which featured Gloria displayed prominently on the cover. The adjacent wall was covered with plaques, ribbons and various awards she had won. Magazines, pictures, and awards were all within viewing distance of Gloria's place on the couch.

Gloria had pulled her eyes away from her magazine to appraise Marc as he entered. The cold look on her face was enough to make Marc wonder if she disliked him simply for interrupting her reading about herself.

"H-hello," Marc said, his voice coming out weak. "M-my name is--"

"Slave," the Glamor Gator said coolly.

"What?"

"Your name," she said, turning her gaze back to her reading. "It's Slave. Whatever you called yourself before, whatever your family called you? That doesn't matter. You're nothing more than a slave, and you belong to me. If you survive until your contract expires, you can go about calling yourself whatever you want, but so long as you're my property, you'll take the name that I give you. And you, are Slave."

Marc's fear was momentarily overcome by his injured pride. Outrage knocked all the horror stories he'd heard of his boss out of his.

"Now you wait just a minute!" Marc said, ill-advisedly taking a few steps towards the colossal man-eater. "I don't know how you treated your other servants, but you're not gonna treat me like some--"

Without the slightest change of expression, Gloria's tail lashed out and wrapped around Marc like a python, knocking the breath out of him. He struggled for air as Gloria idly turned the page of her magazine. Only when Marc was close to blacking out did she loosen her grip enough for him to breathe.

Finally, Gloria looked at her new human, closed her magazine, and showed Marc the cover. Marc paled. It was a cooking magazine. The cover featured Gloria sipping wine as she sat at the end of a candle-lit dinner table. On the platter before her, hog-tied and with an apple in his mouth, was a terrified human man near Marc's age.

"This was another of my humans. His name was Slave too. I can't recall at all, how many slaves I've had between him and you. Like you, he believed he could talk back to me. When he made the poor choice to do it more than once, I decided to have him assist me in a photo-shoot for Fabulous Connoisseur's. He may have been disagreeable as a slave, but he was more than agreeable as dinner. Now... remind me. What was your name again?"

"S-slave!" Marc choked out without hesitation. "My name's Slave, Ms. Gat--"

"Mistress," she said, slightly tightening her grip.

"My name's Slave, Mistress!" you said.

"Good," she said. "Needless to say, further disrespect will result in harsher punishment, but I trust you can't be so thick-witted as to make that mistake again."

Gloria's tail released Marc and he fell to the floor.

"You should feel honored, really," Gloria said as she reclined in her seat and turned her eyes back to her magazine. "Having a mistress as wonderful as me is surely better than serving that barnyard jock or flatulent wannabe-vigilante. Now, for your first task..."
1252.title: Gloria - The Haughty, Vain Maneater

choices: The Carrot lives for another day
12523.content:
Gloria got up from her seat and beckoned Marc to follow with one perfectly-manicured figure. She walked--sauntered really--to the room containing her indoor spa, and he wondered if Gloria was trying to be actively seductive or if she'd just conditioned herself to naturally walk that way. He knew she tried to encapsulate perfection at all times. That might've impressed Marc had she not threatened to kill him less than a minute ago.

The spa room was only slightly smaller than the main room. Everyone used the word "spa" but in reality it was more of a pool. The air was hot and humid inside, the roof covered in a jungle canopy. Bright lights shined through the vegetation. The water didn't bubble but steam came off the surface.

Gloria sat on a nearby lounge chair with her back towards her new slave.

"Unzip me," she said.

Marc blinked. "I'm sorry?" he asked.

"The dress," she said coolly. "Un. Zip. Me."

Marc hurried to obey. Even sitting down she towered over him. He climbed up next to her on the chair and extended to his tiptoes. He was just barely able to grab the black zipper and pull down on it. The times the zipper stuck his heart stuck in his chest, fearing that he'd be blamed for anything that happened to her dress. He avoided staring at the skin he exposed, feeling terrified that merely looking at her was an offense worthy of being devoured. Eventually the zipper was all the way down and as soon as it was, the Glamor Gator stood and shrugged the dress off.

She was wearing a black bikini underneath which left very little to the imagination. Her golden underbelly was fully exposed. Marc couldn't help but wonder how many people just in his position had met their fates in that forgiving gut.

"You seem to be in good shape for a human," Gloria said.

Marc wasn't sure if she meant it as a compliment or just coldly stating a fact. Either way, politeness was probably the best course of action. "Thank you, Mistress," he said.

"Strip to your underwear."

"What?!"

"I don't enjoy repeating myself, Slave. If you're going to keep doing it, I may as well eat you now."

"No, no!" Marc said hurriedly. "I'll do whatever you say, Mistress! See?" He quickly began to strip as fast as he could. Gloria watched him. There was no emotion in those cold, reptilian eyes. Once he was in his underwear she nodded.

"I swim twice a day," she said. "An hour in the morning and an hour at night. And I never eat before I swim."

Marc looked at her awkwardly, not sure what exactly she wanted from him.

"I do my best swimming when sufficiently motivated," she said.

Marc gulped. He had a bad feeling about this. "How can I help motivate you, Mistress?"

"You ever hear about the carrot and the stick, Slave?" she asked.

"... Um..."

She sighed. "You're the carrot. I'm the stick."

Without warning she pushed him into the pool. Marc fell into the deep end and cried out as he hit the hot water. It was scalding. He flailed beneath the water for a second before breaking the surface and sputtering before his indifferent mistress.

"You can swim at least," Gloria nodded. "Good. If you couldn't, I would have to end this right now. Do you see those jets next to you?"

Marc turned and saw two large holes in the wall at the pool's end, underneath the water. When he looked back to his mistress, she was already doing that saunter walk of hers to the other end of the pool. There was a control panel just next to the steps leading to the shallow end. There was a dial that went to 10 and a red switch. She appraised Marc carefully then moved the dial to 5.

"Usually I swim at a 7. Unfortunately I'm still a bit sluggish from yesterday's match. This is good news for you since you're the rare slave who will have time to acclimatize to his new duties."

Marc looked terrified. He didn't feel like this was good news at all.

"As soon as I flip the switch, the jets will start shooting water out. You'll try to stay at those jets, and I'll keep a steady pace swimming behind you. If you don't swim fast enough, they'll blow you to the shallow... To me... You understand the consequences of that happening right?" She bared her teeth.

Marc nodded in fear.

"Good."

Without another word the Glamor Gator flipped the switch. The jets started shooting out water. Even though they were only turned up halfway, the current was faster than Marc expected. Gloria took a few steps in the pool. The hot water didn't bother her at all. Keeping her eyes locked on Marc, she opened her jaw wide and began swimming toward him. Marc yelped and began swimming as hard as he could, though the current was so harsh, he didn't move from the spot he started swimming in. Gloria, on the other hand, glided through the water almost lazily. When she was halfway through the pool she slowed down to swim at a consistent pace.

For Marc, the swimming was murder. He couldn't relent for even a moment or else he'd be swept into the waiting maw of his mistress. Yet there was an hour to go. Could he make it?
12523.title: Spa Placid

125231.content:
Marc swam and swam, pushing his body to the limit as Gloria effortlessly swam behind him, mouth open, waiting to catch him at any moment. He'd tried to keep track of how much time remained in his head, but between the effort of swimming and fear of being breakfast for his new mistress, he lost count frequently. He thought at least 40 mins had passed so far but he couldn't be sure. His arms and legs hurt so much that Marc was positive they'd fall off before the hour was done.

Despite his best efforts, he was slowly losing ground as the jets pushed him back further and further. With a jolt of terror, Marc felt Gloria's hot breath on his feet. He didn't dare look back, but he knew she was right on top of him. The fear gave him a surge of strength and he used it to swim as hard as he could. He prayed to whatever merciful god there was that he wouldn't lose a foot.

DING!

The timer rang. The jets stopped flowing. Without the current Marc managed to make it another few inches forward. That was just enough distance he needed, as Gloria chomped her jaws down behind him, missing his toes by a hairsbreadth. Marc kept swimming until he hit the end of the pool, and hung off the edge, panting heavily. Gloria stood up in the pool.

"Disappointing," she said. "If I'd been going at my usual rate, you'd be dead. Here's hoping you can get faster in time for tonight's swim. Now dry yourself off and prepare me breakfast. There's instructions for you in the kitchen. I expect the meal to be carried out to perfection within the hour."

Gloria got out of the pool and wrapped a towel around herself. She didn't spare Marc a second glance as she left.

"Crazy monster," Marc mumbled to himself, as quietly as possible.

Despite knowing the danger of messing up, Marc wasn't worried too much about cooking, even for an unappeasable connoisseur like the Glamor Gator. A little time in the ASL had been all Marc needed to realize the importance of keeping the fighters well fed. After finding out how many servants got wolfed down for preparing lousy meals, Marc got really good at cooking, really fast. The biggest problem was the time it took to make the massive portions.

Gloria was sitting at her dining room table, wearing a new black dress. Marc brought out the breakfast in waves, each time carrying them on a silver platter so heavy he could've broken his back underneath it. He laid out an omlette, bacon, sausage links, French toast, waffles with whipped cream, crepes, and hashbrowns. When he was done, he stood silently while Gloria sampled what he made.

She tasted a bite of the omlette and she arched an eyebrow in surprise. "Perhaps you're not completely useless, after all."

Marc decided to take that as a compliment. "Thanks Gloria," he said.

The gator's tail reached out and smacked him across the face, knocking him to his knees.

"It's still "Mistress", Slave," she said coolly, sipping her glass of iced orange juice. "If a single compliment is all it takes for you to forget your place, I'll let you go without."

"I hope somebody turns you into a handbag someday," Marc thought.

Gloria continued her meal and Marc kept his mouth shut as she daintily picked at the food he prepared. Despite how ladylike she acted while eating, she still devoured the entire thing in little under fifteen minutes. When she was done, she patted her lips with a napkin and got up from her chair.

"Come along, Slave," she said. "The ASL is holding a press-conference to create hype for my match tomorrow evening."

"Survival?" Marc asked. Gloria narrowed her eyes, hearing the excitement in his voice. "I mean, I just don't want you in danger," he said quickly.

Though Marc was sure she hadn't bought it, for whatever reason the Glamor Gator seemed ready to let his slip go. Maybe she was full from breakfast.

"It's a regular match," she said. "I won't lower myself to messily scarfing someone down in front of a roaring crowd. It's hardly ladylike."

"Then why does the ASL recruit ladies?" Marc thought.

"Who are you fighting?" he asked.

Gloria opened her mouth and responded...
125231.title: The Carrot lives for another day

choices: The press conference goes smoothly (for Marc at least)
A scene breaks out and Marc somehow ends up in the middle of it
1252311.content:
"Dominique."

Gloria ordered Marc to carry her purse for her and Marc grunted in strain as he grabbed it off the table. It weighed a ton. He ended up carrying it by wrapping the spaghetti string around his chest and wearing it it like a backpack.

"The match may not be survival, but maybe me and every assistant in the ASL will get lucky and these two will end up killing each other anyway," Marc thought as he struggled to keep up with Gloria as she walked down the hall.

When they got to the conference center minutes later, the place was packed with reporters and fans. Dominique was seated at the table, and a cat anthro was waiting at the door. She was slender, unlike most anthros Marc had seen around the ASL, but at eleven-feet-tall she was almost double his height. She had black fur, blue hair in a bun, and a purple business suit and skirt. She wore rectangular glasses and had gold eyes. Her name was Penelope Pierce and she was Gloria's agent. Actually, she was Dominique's agent too. In fact, most of the ASL's most popular fighters were represented by her. She didn't look happy.

"You're late," she snapped at Gloria.

Marc was impressed at her bravery since the gator towered over her and could snap her in half with a single bite of her jaws. Gloria wasn't mad though. For the first time since Marc had met her, the gator looked friendly.

"Fashionably late, darling. The better to get the crowd's attention."

"Dominique isn't happy."

Gloria laughed like a noblewoman from a cartoon. "When is she ever?"

At the sound of her laugh, the reporters and fans noticed her. Cameras flashed as they took her picture, and Gloria's fans--mostly drooling men, human and anthro both--began cheering, the closest begging her for autographs. To Marc's complete surprise, Gloria obliged them, signing autographs and making pleasant small-talk with her fans. "Of course she treats her fans well," Marc thought. "She wants their worship. If only they spent a couple minutes alone with her, then see how she treats them."

The other reason Gloria was spending so much time with her fans became clear when Marc got a look at Dominique's face. The hippo was not happy. She'd been kept waiting once, and now she was forced to wait again. Dominique's own fans didn't take the blatant disrespect well either. They all had a kind of grunge/punk/goth look and were mostly made up of anthro men and women, and a few human women. Marc had heard about Dominique's hatred of human men and her fans apparently shared her prejudice. When they saw Marc standing behind Gloria, they put two and two together and began insulting and threatening him too.

"You think you can mock Dominique, runt?!" "Why don't you and your lizard go to hell?" "Come here, twerp, I haven't eaten yet!" "Go against the Dom and she'll turn you into a stain!"

Marc groaned internally. "Well, it's not like I'm here to make friends."

After five minutes of Gloria deliberately stalling, Dominique got up and slammed her fist on the table, breaking it in half. "WILL YOU GET UP HERE?!"

Gloria looked at her like she hadn't even noticed her. "Oh, so sorry, Dominique. I completely forgot you were there."

"Don't mess with me!" the hippo growled.

Ms. Pierce gave Gloria a pointed look and the gator sighed. She took her purse from Marc and muttered under her breath, "Stand up straight and don't move. Don't embarrass me either."

Marc glared at her as she approached the stage. One of Gloria's fans, a human man who'd gotten a selfie with Gloria, leaned over and spoke to you.

"You must be so happy to be working for the Glamor Gator!"

"It's freaking heaven on earth," Marc grumbled.

Employees hauled in a new table and Ms. Pierce grabbed a microphone.

"Good morning, ladies and gentlemen. We apologize for the slight delay, but we'd like to welcome everyone to today's conference. Today we'll be talking about tomorrow's match. This is the big one. The one you've all been waiting for. The fight between Dominique and Gloria!"

The crowd erupted into cheers and rival chants, one side saying, "GO DOM! GO DOM!" and the other, "GLAMOR GATOR! GLAMOR GATOR!"

Ms. Pierce detailed the specifics of tomorrow night's match, hyping up the long build-up between the first ever fight between Gloria and Dominique. She then allowed questions from the press, and said fan questions would follow. Whenever Dominique answered a question, she would pepper her answer with threats of violence, mentions of how no opponent could defeat her, and, if the person questioning her was a human man, she would work take their question, no matter how innocuous, as a personal attack and promised them pain and suffering in return. Eventually they stopped throwing her questions.

Gloria acted the opposite. Whenever asked a question she would respond articulately and cordially, as if she was flattered to be asked a question at all. She turned on the charm, fawning over those who asked her anything, usually making them blush in response. She was clearly trying to buy the fans' and reporters' adulation. It was enough to make Marc roll his eyes. He crossed his arms impatiently, just waiting for the entire thing to be over with.

What happens next?
1252311.title: Get Hype for the Hippo

choices: Marc sweet talks his way out of trouble
Roxie lies and Marc will be punished
12523112.content:
It looked like the press conference was having its desired effect. Gloria and Dominique would trade insults and veiled threats, the fans would holler in excitement and the reporters would write down every word they said. If the conference was any gauge, tomorrow night's match was going to have a lot of hype behind it. Not that Marc cared. After half an hour of this, he was bored as all hell. It was around this time that a female voice whispered from directly behind him.

"That gator's gonna need her food pre-chewed when the Dom's finished with her."

Marc smiled at that image. Then he realized the comment was directed at him. Then he realized it was intended to offend him. "Damn it," Marc thought. "Did one of Dominique's fans get over here? How did one of those behemoths waddle over without me noticing? Just stay calm. Act like you didn't hear her. Last thing I need is for Gloria to think I'm trying to steal her spotlight."

"Hey! I'm talking to you... What are you deaf, runt?"

The woman slapped Marc on the back of his head. He couldn't help himself but turn around to look at his attacker. What he saw surprised him. The woman was a squirrel anthro with red fur. She was pudgy with chubby cheeks. She was definitely a Dominique fan. She wore the same kind of goth/punk clothes as her other fans, and she dyed her black hair with indigo tips. Her bangs hid one of her eyes. Her t-shirt had an indigo silhouette of Dominique on it, the hippo had one leg on the back of a kneeling human. None of this was what surprised Marc. The thing that shocked him the most about the anthro was that she was... tiny! She was a foot shorter than him, absolutely miniscule by anthro standards!

Marc couldn't help it. He'd been expecting a big bruiser and turned around to find a shrimp. He laughed. The squirrel scowled. Her cheeks turned red.

"What the hell's so funny, runt?!" she demanded.

"Nothing!" Marc said. He forced his face back into a serious expression. "Sorry. Just... remembering a joke from earlier!" He cringed at how lame the excuse was. "What can I help you with?"

"Don't make fun of me!" the squirrel snapped. "We all knew what you were doing. You and that stupid lizard were making fun of Dominique. Well you're not gonna be laughing when she breaks that gator's legs!"

Actually Marc did think that was funny, and made the mistake of laughing again. That just made the squirrel angrier.

"That's it! You've pissed me off! You and me. Outside. Right now!"

"What are you crazy? Ok. First off, I'm not allowed to leave the premises without permission. Second, you really want to fight me? I mean you're so sh--"

Marc didn't get another word out. The squirrel opened her mouth impossibly wide and before he knew what was happening he was head and shoulders deep inside her, face-to-face with her uvula.

"What the f--GET THE HELL OFF ME!"

The squirrel tried to swallow him but Marc was able to get his hands up and pushed against her mouth. His attacker was suspended in the air while Marc was left in the dark. Outside he could hear screams as people saw what was going on. Some of Dominique's fans began cheering the squirrel on as they saw her trying to swallow Marc whole.

"Go get him, Roxie!" one of them called.

Marc's hands were beginning to slip against the slippery insides of her mouth. Marc remembered where the wall was and ran over to. He started slamming against it, giving Roxie's head a good pounding too. It was enough to daze her and her attempts to eat him were weaker. Marc finally managed to shove her off with the suction sound of a miniature vacuum being pulled off skin. He saw two anthro security guards rushing over to them. One of them grabbed Roxie as she lunged to continue the fight and the other grabbed you.

"What the hell was that sorry excuse of a man doing to my fan?" Dominique bellowed at Gloria, as if her fan hadn't tried to eat her slave alive. "If he hurt her, I'll grind him into a pancake!"

Gloria ignored the second part of her sentence. "A good question, Dominique. What were you doing?"

Gloria asked the question in a frosty voice. Marc realized all eyes, including his mistress's, were on him. She looked ready to kill. Marc gulped. How would he be able to talk his way out of this?

What happens next?

1) Marc is able to salvage the press conference by acting like the entire thing was a publicity stunt to generate more hype. Gloria will not punish him.

2) Roxie spins the story first and Gloria lets Dominique or Roxie punish Marc however they want.
12523112.title: Feuding Fans

125231122.content:
Marc knew he needed to handle the situation with grace and finesse otherwise his mistress would throw him to the wolves. Unfortunately, the direness of the situation still didn't mean his brain was fast enough at coming up with an excuse.

"Uhhhhhh... W-well... You see--"

"He was horrible!" a meek, pitiful voice cried out. The pain and heartache in the voice shocked Marc. He looked to his side and was surprised to see the same squirrel that had just tried to eat him alive was now bawling her eyes out. "The m-man s-said that Dominique didn't stand a chance against Gloria! H-he s-said that G-Gloria was gonna make an exception to her d-diet and eat Dominique alive during the match! I b-begged him to s-stop, but he just kept saying Dominique was a dead woman over and over again, a-a-and I-I-I c-couldn't bear to hear him say that! Dominique is m-my h-hero!"

Squirrel, nothing! This woman was a weasel! Marc couldn't believe the lies he heard her say about him. And the worst part was how convincing she sounded: the poor, pitiful heartbroken fan trying to defend her idol's honor. If he hadn't known the truth for himself, even he would've believed her.

"That's a lie!" Marc yelled. "I never said any of that! She jumped me out of nowhere!"

Roxie broke out into bigger sobs at being called a liar and the crowd booed at him. None of them believed him. Dominique was fuming and her fans were calling for his blood. Gloria's fans looked at him like he was a disgrace to their shining star. Even the reporters looked at him like he was a monster. Marc looked at Gloria for help, but her eyes were cold. Marc gulped. He was a dead man and he knew it.

"THAT'S IT GLAMOR GATOR!" Dominique roared. She was almost frothing at the mouth. "FIRST YOU SHOW UP LATE, THEN YOUR SLAVE ATTACKS ONE OF MY FANS, AND NOW HE CALLS HER A LIAR?! I DON'T WANNA WAIT FOR THE MATCH, I'LL EAT YOU AND YOUR HUMAN ALIVE RIGHT HERE!"

Gloria didn't respond right away. She took a deep breath, composed herself, and spoke clearly. "I am deeply remorseful for the actions of my servant, Dominique. I swear to you that I never told him to obey in such a disrespectful manner--and I certainly never made any claim that I would eat you during our match. It goes against my nature, and I have to maintain my girlish figure, after all." There was some laughter from the reporters and Gloria's fans at that. Dominique and her own fans just grumbled.

"Nevertheless," Gloria continued, "I admit that the flaws in my slave's behavior are a reflection of my poor instruction. For this, I am truly sorry and pray for your forgiveness."

Gloria's fans made pitying sounds. Clearly they thought she was being too hard on herself. Personally, Marc would rather she be hard on herself rather than him, but his opinion didn't count for much here.

"As an apology, I will offer up my slave's life to Dominique. You may do with him whatever you please. It may hurt me to lose his service, but it is a sacrifice I'm willing to bare to maintain the dignity of our sport."

The fans and reporters cheered. Even Marc had to admit it was impressively done. Gloria maintained her air of glamor and superiority while coming across as gracious and sympathetic. Roxie got to look like the poor victim and gained the attention of the reporters as well as her hero. And Dominique got a human male--her favorite type of victim--to destroy in any way she desired. It was a win-win for everyone... except for Marc, of course. As the aforementioned, soon-to-be-destroyed human male, he was horrified.

He met Dominique's vengeful gaze and began desperately trying to squirm out of the grip of security. From the corner of his eye he saw Roxie smirking at him. Her tears had dried up and there was an evil look in her eyes just for him.

"I'll take you up on that offer, Glamor Gator," Dominique sneered, stepping down from the stage. She loomed over Marc and he gulped audibly. "I'm gonna show this pathetic runt exactly what I do to insects like him, but know this you overgrown suitcase. What I do to him's gonna be nothing compared to what I do to you in our match. Nobody hurts my fans. Anyone who does deals with the Dom-Inator!" Dominique's fans hooted and hollered, but Gloria remained as composed as ever.

"Now," the titanic hippo said, turning her full attention to Marc. "I'd love nothing more than to destroy you right here and now, but you hurt one of my fans, so she's the one who gets to decide what happens to you." She turned to the squirrel. "What's your name, hun?"

"R-Roxie," the squirrel said, blushing furiously at being addressed by her hero.

"You're the victim here. What would you like to be done to this maggot?"

Roxie looked between Dominique and Marc. She smiled wide and Marc's heart plummeted.

What does Roxie want?

1) Roxie wants Dominique to feed Marc to her, right in front of everyone.

2) Roxie wants to train with Dominique and use Marc as their personal practice dummy.
125231122.title: Roxie lies and Marc will be punished

1252311221.content:
"If it wouldn't be too much trouble, it would be an honor if you would... feed him to me?" Roxie blushed and waited her answer with bated breath.

Dominique chuckled. "Sure thing, hon. Your meal was rudely interrupted. It's only right we put this pathetic loser right where he belongs."

Roxie looked overjoyed and Dominique's fans cheered their idol on. The applause washed out Marc's begging and pleading for mercy. Not that he figured it would've done much good anyway. Dominique was infamous for her hatred of human males, a hatred her fans shared. The giant hippo grabbed Marc, pinning his arms to his side. Marc could make out Dominique's fans pointing and laughing at him as he kicked and screamed. Dominique held Marc above the squirrel and prepared to lower him down head-first. There were flashes as photographers and fans took pictures of the sight. Marc had no doubt he'd be a headline somewhere.

"Wait!" Roxie held up her hand and Dominique stopped. The jeers of the crowd grew quiet. Marc sighed in relief, hardly believing his good luck. Was the squirrel actually showing him mercy? Of course not. "Stuff him in feet-first. I want photos so I can see the look on his face before he slides down my throat. I'll make the one with his most pathetic expression my profile pic!"

Marc's heart fell but Dominique found it hilarious. "You have an evil mind, hun. I love it!"

Dominique didn't waste any time, she repositioned him before he could object and lowered him into Roxie's hungry maw. The squirrel couldn't stop the flow of drool leaking from her mouth onto her shirt as she waited in anticipation for her meal.
